name: Robin Morningwood Adventure - A gay RPG
name_original: Robin Morningwood Adventure - A gay RPG
description:
Robin Morningwood Adventure is a gay (bara) RPG video game where you play an adventurer, discovering Whellcum, a gay village.
SUPER GAY BATTLESLearn new hot skills, buy butt plugs and craft cockrings to become a better fighter!

HOT GAY MINI GAMESPlay mini games to help the villagers and increase your affinity with them!
UNDERWEAR SNIFFINGCollect underwear from the villagers to sniff them and relive their hottest NSFW memories!
COLLECTING CARD GAMECollect cards by playing Strip lucky with the villagers (not available in the demo).
